name: Nicole's Fears Remake
description:
You are stuck in a nightmare, you have to get out of it as soon as possible! How are you going to get out from it? Are you doing the right thing?

There are more to this than it looks...

Nicole's Fears Remake is a horror game that you collect roses to W̵̢̖̜̥͔̗̘̘̠̲̞͕̙̙͂́̀͝I̸̧̘̘̥̼̮̝͉̰̬̟̤̠̫̓̾̍͐̿̑̔͛̂̓̾̓̕̚͘Ň̷̳͖̝͓̺̙̯̗̙̇.

You can hide, run, crouch, pick up and examine.

The Game isn't big, perhaps, and will receive updates.
